feed.title: Oracle Dev.O Tutorials
feed.subtitle: Cool stuff from Oracle's Developer Relations team

entry.title: GoLang–Consuming Oracle REST API from an Oracle Cloud Database

link.title: GoLang–Consuming Oracle REST API from an Oracle Cloud Database

entry.content: Brendan Tierney shares a method to call an in-database machine learning model and then process the data it returns using GoLang.
entry.summary: Brendan Tierney shares a method to call an in-database machine learning model and then process the data it returns using GoLang.

entry.title: How to import data from Microsoft SQL Server to MySQL Database Service

link.title: How to import data from Microsoft SQL Server to MySQL Database Service

entry.content: This tutorial walks you through the process for exporting data from Microsoft SQL Server and then importing it into MySQL Database Service in OCI.
entry.summary: This tutorial walks you through the process for exporting data from Microsoft SQL Server and then importing it into MySQL Database Service in OCI.

entry.title: Use Matomo Website Analytics on OCI with MDS

link.title: Use Matomo Website Analytics on OCI with MDS

entry.content: Matamo, an alternative to Google Analytics, is becoming increasingly popular. This walkthrough shows you how to use this powerful tool with MySQL Database Service and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure.
entry.summary: Matamo, an alternative to Google Analytics, is becoming increasingly popular. This walkthrough shows you how to use this powerful tool with MySQL Database Service and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure.

entry.title: Get Started with the Feature Store HopsWorks (LogicalClocks) on Oracle Cloud

link.title: Get Started with the Feature Store HopsWorks (LogicalClocks) on Oracle Cloud

entry.content: This walk-through will guide you through setting up your environment to run HopsWorks with OCI.
entry.summary: This walk-through will guide you through setting up your environment to run HopsWorks with OCI.

entry.title: Installation Guide for OCI Monitoring
entry.content: This tutorial walks you through configuring a basic OCI monitoring solution with components based on Ansible in Oracle Linux 8.
entry.summary: This tutorial walks you through configuring a basic OCI monitoring solution with components based on Ansible in Oracle Linux 8.

entry.content: How to deploy Verrazzano an OKE cluster.

entry.title: Creating flexible OCI Load Balancers with OKE

link.title: Creating flexible OCI Load Balancers with OKE

entry.content: New load balancer shapes mean more options to optimize your configuration. Ali walks you through how to create these shapes using OKE.
entry.summary: New load balancer shapes mean more options to optimize your configuration. Ali walks you through how to create these shapes using OKE.

entry.title: More Terraform Resources
entry.content: A curated list of helpful resources for expanding your knowledge of Terraform.

entry.title: Destroying resources with Terraform
entry.content: How to keep things neat and tidy with Terraform.

entry.title: Polyglot Application Observability
entry.content: Use GraalVM to leverage the PinPoint service, which allows tracing transactions and data flows between multiple software components and identifies problematic areas along with potential bottlenecks.
entry.summary: Use GraalVM to leverage the PinPoint service, which allows tracing transactions and data flows between multiple software components and identifies problematic areas along with potential bottlenecks.
